detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: With decades of employment law experience handling some of the toughest trials, Gordon Law Group’s employment lawyers understand the underlying legal issues. They have the knowledge, skills, and experience needed to guide clients to successful outcomes without sacrificing results.

detailsData.title: Employee Advocacy
detailsData.content: Dedicated to employee litigation and advocacy, representing employees at all stages of their careers, from service workers to CEOs. The firm is committed to advocating for employees who have been wronged.

detailsData.title: Class Action Expertise
detailsData.content: Gordon Law Group has been among the pioneers in class action litigation. Their Boston employment lawyers are often recognized for their work across a wide variety of industries.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Services
detailsData.content: The firm handles a wide range of employment law matters, including wage and hour, overtime, commissions, bonuses, and employment discrimination. They also assist with employment contracts, non-competition clauses, and severance agreements.
